sentences: Meie ei p천lga t체tarlast p채rast seda, kui ta on meie omaks saanud.
Ta ootas kaua, et lapsed oleksid tema omaks v천etud.
See laps sai lasteaias mitme lapse omaks.
context: The Estonian word 'omaks' is part of the verb phrase 'omaks saama', which means to become someone's or something's through adoption or acceptance. It can mean to adopt a child, to accept something as one's own, or to embrace something fully. The word indicates a process of becoming possessed by or belonging to someone else.
